release_notes: Code quality improvements - reduced cyclomatic complexity in all Python modules

versions.release_notes: Code quality improvements - reduced cyclomatic complexity in all Python modules
changelog: IMPROVED: Reduced cyclomatic complexity in all Python modules (all functions now ≤10)
IMPROVED: sync_ps_invoice.py - added 11 helper functions, create_ghl_invoice 54→10
IMPROVED: create_ghl_contactsheet.py - added 6 helper functions, _build_image_labels 18→5
IMPROVED: validate_license.py - added 12 helper functions, activate_license 16→7
IMPROVED: Better code maintainability and testability across all sync scripts

versions.release_notes: Remote debug logging with GitHub Gist upload, verbose logging throughout sync process
changelog: NEW: Remote debug logging - logs auto-uploaded to private GitHub Gist
NEW: Logs organized by GHL Location ID in subfolders
NEW: Send Logs button and Auto-send toggle on About tab
NEW: Auto-send ON by default for new installations
IMPROVED: Verbose logging for XML parsing, contact operations, invoices
IMPROVED: Media upload logging with file paths, sizes, API responses
IMPROVED: Contact sheet workflow logging with success/failure details

versions.release_notes: Bug fixes for PayPlan calculator, invoice sync, and build script
changelog: FIX: PayPlan Calculator button click not opening calculator
FIX: Payment Type selection sending wrong value
FIX: Invoice sync crash on compiled .exe (stdout None check)
FIX: Client ID validation false positive (<Client_ID> vs <ClientId>)
FIX: Build script missing sync_ps_invoice.exe in releases
IMPROVED: Quick Publish removed manual pauses
IMPROVED: Client ID validation before invoice sync
IMPROVED: Full high-DPI display support for DarkMsgBox
IMPROVED: Button dimensions, spacing, and fonts scale with DPI
FIX: Button obscuring text on What's New dialog

versions.release_notes: Invoice sync improvements and contact sheet generation
changelog: NEW: Contact sheet JPG generation from ProSelect orders
NEW: Auto-upload contact sheets to GHL Media
IMPROVED: Invoice sync with payment schedule support
